name: Picalese (Pickled Chilies)
recipeIngredient: 12 habanero or Scotch bonnet chili peppers, thinly sliced
1/2 small Spanish onion, peeled and thinly sliced
1 small carrot, peeled and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a jar with a tight-fitting lid, add the chilies, onion and carrot and enough vinegar to cover. Store in the refrigerator up to 2 weeks. Use to spice up soups, stews and rice dishes.
